default_questions.question: Did the symptom start suddenly or gradually? (sudden/gradual)
Do you currently have a fever (measured or felt)? (yes/no)
Is your cough productive (with phlegm) or dry? (productive/dry)
Do you experience breathlessness while resting? (yes/no)
If you have chest pain, is it sharp, pressure-like, or burning? (sharp/pressure/burning)
Where exactly is the abdominal pain? (upper-right/upper-left/lower-right/lower-left/central)
Do you have confusion, severe headache with neck stiffness, or fainting? (yes/no)
Have you traveled recently or been exposed to someone sick? (yes/no)
Do you currently have any skin rash or unusual marks? (yes/no)
On a scale of 1 to 10, how severe is your pain?

Influenza|Common_Cold.question: Do you have muscle pain or body ache along with fever and cough? (yes/no)

Dengue|Malaria.question: Is your fever accompanied by severe joint pain or chills? (yes/no)

Typhoid|Gastroenteritis.question: Have you had prolonged fever with abdominal discomfort or diarrhea? (yes/no)

Hepatitis|Gallstones.question: Is the pain mainly in the upper-right side of your abdomen? (yes/no)

Gastritis|Gastroenteritis.question: Do you have nausea or vomiting along with abdominal pain? (yes/no)

Myocardial_Infarction|Angina.question: Is your chest pain accompanied by sweating, nausea, or pain radiating to the left arm? (yes/no)

Pneumonia|Bronchitis.question: Do you have fever with a productive (phlegm) cough? (yes/no)

Migraine|Tension_Headache.question: Is the headache one-sided and sensitive to light or noise? (yes/no)

Appendicitis|Gastroenteritis.question: Did the abdominal pain start near the navel and move to the lower-right side? (yes/no)

Asthma|COPD.question: Do you experience wheezing or difficulty breathing that worsens at night? (yes/no)

Diabetes|Hypoglycemia.question: Do you experience excessive thirst or sweating with dizziness? (yes/no)

Hypertension|Anxiety.question: Do you have frequent headaches or palpitations when stressed? (yes/no)

Tuberculosis|Pneumonia.question: Have you been coughing for more than 2 weeks or coughing blood? (yes/no)

COVID19|Influenza.question: Have you experienced loss of smell or taste recently? (yes/no)

Kidney_Stone|UTI.question: Do you feel severe pain on one side of your lower back with painful urination? (yes/no)

Malaria|Typhoid.question: Do you experience alternating high fever and chills? (yes/no)

Sinusitis|Migraine.question: Does your headache worsen when you bend forward or in the morning? (yes/no)

Chickenpox|Measles.question: Do you have an itchy rash that started on your trunk and spread to limbs? (yes/no)

Depression|Anxiety.question: Do you feel persistent sadness or worry that affects daily life? (yes/no)

Gastric_Ulcer|Acid_Reflux.question: Does your stomach pain increase after eating or at night? (yes/no)

Otitis_Media|Sinusitis.question: Do you feel ear fullness or facial pressure with nasal blockage? (yes/no)

Conjunctivitis|Allergy.question: Are your eyes red with watery discharge and itching? (yes/no)

Malaria|Dengue.question: Do you have high fever with chills or joint and eye pain? (yes/no)

Bronchial_Asthma|Allergy.question: Do your symptoms get worse after exposure to dust or cold air? (yes/no)

Epilepsy|Syncope.question: Did you lose consciousness with body stiffness or jerking? (yes/no)

Anemia|Hypothyroidism.question: Do you feel persistent fatigue and pale skin? (yes/no)

Migraine|Cluster_Headache.question: Does your headache occur in repeated attacks on one side of the head? (yes/no)

UTI|Pyelonephritis.question: Do you have fever, back pain, and painful urination? (yes/no)

Pneumonia|COVID19.question: Do you have dry cough, fever, and shortness of breath? (yes/no)

Food_Poisoning|Gastroenteritis.question: Did the symptoms start after eating outside food? (yes/no)

Hepatitis|Pancreatitis.question: Do you have yellowing of eyes and upper abdominal pain radiating to the back? (yes/no)

Stroke|Migraine.question: Do you have weakness on one side or sudden vision problems? (yes/no)

Arthritis|Osteoporosis.question: Do you have joint pain that increases with movement or stiffness in the morning? (yes/no)

Hypothyroidism|Depression.question: Do you feel tired, gain weight, or have dry skin and low mood? (yes/no)

Anxiety|Panic_Attack.question: Do you experience chest tightness, trembling, or shortness of breath suddenly? (yes/no)

UTI|Kidney_Infection.question: Do you have fever, flank pain, or burning during urination? (yes/no)

Gallstones|Pancreatitis.question: Does your abdominal pain worsen after fatty meals? (yes/no)

Sinusitis|Allergic_Rhinitis.question: Do you have sneezing, nasal congestion, and facial pain? (yes/no)

Liver_Cirrhosis|Hepatitis.question: Have you noticed yellow eyes or swelling in the abdomen or legs? (yes/no)

Pneumonia|Tuberculosis.question: Do you have chronic cough with sputum or blood? (yes/no)

Diabetes|Thyroid_Disorder.question: Have you experienced weight loss, fatigue, or excessive urination? (yes/no)
